com.reachcp317.reach

Class UserRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.reachcp317.reach.UserRepository

  • @Repository
public class UserRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    Retrieves/updates User information through a MySQL database
    Author:
    Morgenne Besenschek For more documentation see https://docs.spring.io/spring/docs/4.0.x/spring-framework-reference/html/jdbc.html Note: JdbcTemplate methods will always create a PreparedStatement, even if it is only given an SQL String. See: https://docs.spring.io/spring/docs/current/javadoc-api/org/springframework/jdbc/core/JdbcTemplate.html
